snippet.title: Hazelnut Bastille First Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1330693854/hazelnut-bastille-a-16bit-indie-adventure 
Hazelnut Bastille, for PC, Mac, and Linux, and now Nintendo Switch, is a lush, topdown Zelda-like Metroidvania in a 16bit JRPG style, which seeks to continue the great lineage of superior design from the mid 90's. Hazelnut has been in development since April 2016, and we will continue bring updates and content to our homepage and Twitter as things continue to progress!

You can sign up for our Newsletter, And find the demo at:

https://www.aloftstudio.com/hazelnutbastille

Find and follow us on twitter, at:

https://twitter.com/AloftStudio

Crash our discord at:

https://discord.gg/VVXThhm 

We'd like to thank everyone for their continued support! Stay Awesome!
